item.title: Government shutdown live updates as stalemate continues into second week
item.description: The 2025 government shutdown entered its sixth day on Monday with no signs of an imminent resolution. Follow live updates here.

item.title: Hurricane Priscilla intensifying off southwest Mexico. Maps show forecast path.
item.description: Priscilla strengthened into a hurricane Sunday and was getting stronger early Monday, forecasters said.
